definitions: To write one's name on (a letter, document, etc.) to show that one has written it, agrees with it, or is responsible for it.
To use gestures to convey information or instructions.
To make a mark or symbol.
To engage (a person) by written agreement, especially for employment or performance.
To indicate or be a symbol of something.
examples: Please sign your name at the bottom of the form.
She signed to her friend across the room.
The team signed a new player.
Dark clouds often sign a coming storm.
